comment._content: Thanks for sharing this intriguing collection on the web. I've generated an animated gif here to assist viewing without eyestrain.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: A later photo of Locomotive No.1 with all his friends and relations, but without the Thin Controller. - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2376882538/

comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: The bloke was supposedly William Sixsmith who drove no.1. Was it, or was it not? No other photos of the chap seem to exist in any format.

comment._content: Loved the animated GIF.. sure did help with seeing how it would of looked.
